extendedInfo.description: The power nap is thought to maximize the benefits of sleep versus time. If you donât want to nap a long time, set an alarm.This app is easy to use. Just open the Power Nap application on your Android, put the time you want to tweak power and as soon as you set time, it begins countdown. The app beeps when time is up.

reviews.title: Masters student
reviews.comment: By far the best app I have ever downloaded.  I can\'t explain how much it helped me during my final paper. I was able to get the best nap times ever to recharge and get going again.
reviews.author: Shayla Kelly

reviews.comment: It\'s a useful good app! However, perhaps an estimated time (hopefully customizable) for people to fall asleep can be added into the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: If  you\'re still on Android 2.3.6(GB) the app will vibrate regardless if you disabled the phone\'s system settings. So you will wake up to the app vibrating regardless. I upgraded to ICS and it works great now.
reviews.author: Teddy Yen

reviews.comment: Way more convenient than setting a alarm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t reliably wake me
reviews.comment: I\'m uninstalling after over-sleeping three times. When it does wake me it seems quite loud and persistent so I assume that it simply didn\'t play the alarm.
reviews.author: Nick B

reviews.title: gotta luv it!
reviews.comment: very helpful indeed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: decent ad-supported app but no volume control
reviews.comment: besides being ad supported, it does not seem to have a way to set a gentle alarm. It immediately vibrates and plays your alarm at full volume which can be kind of disturbing and jolts me from sleep.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not cool.
reviews.comment: Sadly, I\'ve decided to uninstall this app because it seems to run in the background even when you are not napping. Not cool, GITS Indonesia.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unreliable
reviews.comment: This would be absolutely perfect....but it doesn\'t go off every time. Didn\'t go off 2 out of 5 times. (Droid Incredible 2)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best nap app.
reviews.comment: I have this on one of my lauch screens.  ...nuff said.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: So easy to use - better than setting a regular alarm when you\'re super tired.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good app but I can\'t adjust the volume of alarm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good before update
reviews.comment: Was good. But since update I will set it and when it goes off, it will ring even after I turn it off. Have to restart phone to stop ringing. Galaxy s2
reviews.author: darren cichonski

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Needs a 15 minute nap time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: Like custom time, or longer times like \"super lazy man\" or \"bear nap\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: At it\'s best
reviews.comment: Simple nice alarm
reviews.author: Kartik Dange

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Just do what you want
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Like a quick nap? Get this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great App!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its purely an awesome app
reviews.author: A Google User
